Queries: CREATE TABLE ItemInventoryMap (ItemID varchar(32) NOT NULL, ItemInventoryKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ItemInventoryKey))

CREATE TABLE NodeInventoryMap (ItemInventoryKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, ItemID varchar(32) NOT NULL, ShipNode varchar(16) NOT NULL, IsActive bool DEFAULT TRUE, NodeInventoryKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (NodeInventoryKey))
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX nodeinvmap_ind1 ON NodeInventoryMap(ItemID, ShipNode)

CREATE TABLE ItemNodeSupply (NodeInventoryKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, SupplyType varchar(16) NOT NULL, Quantity int DEFAULT 0, SupplyDate date, ItemNodeSupplyKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ItemNodeSupplyKey))

CREATE TABLE ItemNodeDemand (NodeInventoryKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, DemandType varchar(16) NOT NULL, Quantity int DEFAULT 0, DemandDate date, DemandReference varchar(24) NOT NULL, DemandExpiryDate date, ItemNodeDemandKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ItemNodeDemandKey))
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX itemnodedmnd_ind1 ON ItemNodeDemand(DemandReference, NodeInventoryKey)
CREATE TABLE ItemNodeDemandConsolidated (NodeInventoryKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, Quantity int DEFAULT 0, ItemNodeDmdConsolKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY 	(ItemNodeDmdConsolKey))

CREATE TABLE ItemNodeInventoryAudit (NodeInventoryKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, OldQuantity int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, NewQuantity int DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, IsSupplyChange bool NOT NULL, AuditType varchar(32) NOT NULL, EventDate varchar(32) NOT NULL, ItemNodeAuditKey varchar(32) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ItemNodeAuditKey))
